mainText:
I'm 17 years old and I'm from Brazil. I was a big fan of Jobs and. I belive the tecnology would not be the same without him. 

He revolutionized the computer science and technology!

He was a big man ,a genius and a hero and will stay forever in history !

God bless! And he rest in peace seeing that all he created! 		 	   		  
Thanks for all Steve‚Äè
author: Caio
